homeHeader.title: Trade Across the UAE, Secure High-Value Contracts, & Drive Unlimited Growth  with a UAE Mainland Visa
homeHeader.description: Struggling with complex regulations, high rejection risks, and endless paperwork? Tap into the UAE’s 2B+ consumer base, benefit from competitive tax incentives, and leverage world-class amenities with a Dubai Mainland Visa. Whether you’re a startup building your foundation or an enterprise expanding across regions, we simplify the process, cut rejection risks, and fast-track approvals so you can scale your business with confidence

leftSection_1.title: What is a Mainland Visa in the UAE & Why Does it Matter
leftSection_1.description: Trade across borders, sponsor loved ones, and operate your business anywhere across the UAE with a mainland visa. Build local visibility and capture customers worldwide to scale your business hassle-free.

items.title: Tap Into New Markets, Build Stronger Partnerships, & Scale Globally
items.subTitle: Tap Into New Markets, Build Stronger Partnerships, & Scale Globally
items.description: Take advantage of Dubai's strategic location to access diverse markets in Europe, Asia, and Africa. Capture government clients and B2B buyers within and beyond the UAE, fully compliant.

items.title: Increase Visa Allocations, Expand Your Workforce, & Unlock Growth Opportunities
items.subTitle: Increase Visa Allocations, Expand Your Workforce, & Unlock Growth Opportunities
items.description: Running a business in the UAE takes the right team to succeed and outpace the competition. To do that, you need top global talent—but many businesses hit roadblocks with limited visas, slowing down both hiring and growth. With a UAE residence visa, you qualify for 6+ visa applications and exciting sponsorship opportunities.

items.title: Gain 100% Ownership, Operate Without Local Sponsors, & Maximize Returns
items.subTitle: Gain 100% Ownership, Operate Without Local Sponsors, & Maximize Returns
items.description: Skip the hassle of partnering with a local sponsor and enjoy complete strategic ownership of your mainland business. Get competitive tax rates and maximise profits with full capital repatriation.

items.title: Open Branches Anywhere in the UAE, Expand Seamlessly, & Serve More Clients
items.subTitle: Open Branches Anywhere in the UAE, Expand Seamlessly, & Serve More Clients
items.description: Many businesses get stuck in red tape when trying to expand in the UAE. Its foreign  legal framework and lengthy approval processes often stall operations and slow down business growth. With a mainland visa, scale your brand hassle-free by launching branches across the UAE or the Gulf region, all without jurisdictional roadblocks or operational disruptions.

iconTitleSec.title: What Do Businesses Need to Secure a UAE Mainland Visa?
iconTitleSec.description: Fast-track entry into the UAE by obtaining your mainland visa with:

items.title: A company trade license under the mainland authority
A copy of a salary certificate or work contract
Copies of the three months of recent bank statements (if you’re a resident)
Tenancy contract for an office space

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to get a mainland visa?
items.answer: It generally takes 5-10 working days, depending on several factors, such as authority approvals, document readiness, and potential delays.

items.question: How do I renew my UAE mainland visa?
items.answer: To renew your UAE mainland visa, you’ll have to update your application, provide the latest documents, and undergo a medical examination. You can streamline the process by connecting with our specialists.

items.question: Are there limits on how many visas I can apply for?
items.answer: No! Mainland companies offer flexible quotas depending on your office size and license activity.

items.question: Can I cancel my mainland visa, and how?
items.answer: You can cancel your mainland visa by submitting a professional application, submitting the required documents, and paying the application fee. Our expert consultants ease the task by streamlining the process.

items.question: Can I apply for a mainland visa without a local sponsor?
items.answer: Yes, thanks to updated UAE laws, many business activities now allow 100% foreign ownership, meaning you can secure your visa without a local sponsor.

items.question: Can I sponsor my family using a mainland visa?
items.answer: Yes. Once your visa is active, our expert consultants can help guide you through spouse and child sponsorship.
